page.title: 04Shelve Church.
page.content: The church overlooks the village and is surrounded by the graveyard. The most recent grave is dated 1983 and the oldest we found was dated 1835. There appeared to be too many graves for the small village. The windows are arched with small diamond shaped pieces of stained glass. There is a cross on the roof. There is an iron gate which was unlocked. There were many lilies growing around the graves. Inside the very small church, which is served by an itinerant vicar,there is a tiny gallery with one bellrope. There is also a visitors book.
